A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi was beautifully written\, and while it did not go as expected\, it was better than I could have hoped. As a lifelong Star Wars fan who grew up in the 1980's with the Original Trilogy\, I am absolutely supportive of the new direction this new trilogy has taken. I have seen this film twice and I may have to watch it again before I buy it on BluRay. Bravo to Rian Johnson and the entire cast of Star Wars: The Last Jedi.
